ingredients: boneless chicken, yogurt, garlic, ginger, garam masala, cumin, coriander, paprika, turmeric, salt, tomato sauce, cream
cooking_method: 1. Marinate the chicken in a mixture of yogurt, garlic, ginger, and spices. 2. Grill or sauté the chicken until cooked through. 3. Simmer the tomato sauce with cream and additional spices. 4. Add the cooked chicken to the sauce and heat through. 5. Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

ingredients: paneer cheese, spinach, onion, garlic, ginger, ghee, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt
cooking_method: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in ghee. 2. Add spinach and spices and cook until wilted. 3. Purée the mixture in a blender. 4. Fry paneer cheese until lightly browned. 5. Add the spinach purée to the pan with the paneer and heat through. 6. Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

ingredients: chickpeas, onion, garlic, ginger, tomato, ghee, garam masala, cumin, coriander, turmeric, salt
cooking_method: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in ghee. 2. Add tomato and spices and cook until softened. 3. Add chickpeas and water and simmer until heated through. 4. Serve hot with rice or naan bread.

cooking_method: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in ghee. 2. Add tomato and spices and cook until softened. 3. Add spinach and cook until wilted. 4. Purée the mixture in a blender. 5. ingredients: rice, chicken or lamb, onion, garlic, ginger, ghee, cinnamon, cardamom, cloves, coriander, cumin, turmeric, saffron, salt
cooking_method: 1. Sauté onion, garlic, and ginger in ghee. 2. Add spices and cook until fragrant. 3. Add chicken or lamb and cook until browned. 4. Cook rice in water or broth until tender. 5. Layer the rice and meat mixture in a baking dish. 6. Cover with saffron 7. Serve hot with meat curry and borhani.

ingredients: 2 potatoes, 1 cauliflower, 1 onion, 2 tomatoes, 2 cloves garlic, 1 inch ginger, 2 green chilies, 1 tsp cumin seeds, 1 tsp turmeric powder, 1 tsp coriander powder, 1 tsp garam masala, salt, oil
cooking_method: 1. Peel and dice the potatoes, chop the cauliflower into florets, and slice the onion, tomatoes, garlic, and ginger.  2. Heat oil in a pan and add cumin seeds. Once they sputter, add onions and sauté until translucent. Add ginger, garlic, and green chilies and sauté for a minute.  3. Add the diced potatoes and sauté for 5 minutes until they are partially cooked. Then add the cauliflower and stir well.  4. Add turmeric, coriander powder, and salt to taste. Mix well and let it cook for 5 minutes on medium heat.
